forum_events.name: forum_action
forum_events.description: Forum action, including reply, upvote, unvote, update, delete, close, follow_thread, unfollow_thread, pin, unpin, follow_user, target_user, read, read_inline, search, enter_forum, created_thread, created_response, created_comment

forum_events.name: thread_id
forum_events.description: unique forum id for forum thread/response/comment related to this event

forum_events.name: search_query
forum_events.description: Search query for event. Unavailable before June 1, 2015

forum_events.name: event_GET
forum_events.description: GET parameter for event. Unavailable before June 1, 2015

description: Table generated with SQL query file forum_events.sql using the simeon CLI tool. It tracks forum interactions between users in a given course.
